abstract: Release an approved version of your app to the App Store.
overview:
## Discussion

When you submit your app for review, if itʼs approved and the status changes to Pending Developer Release, then you can release a version. # Manually Release an App Store Approved Version of Your App

**Web Service Endpoint**

Release an approved version of your app to the App Store.

## Discussion

When you submit your app for review, if itʼs approved and the status changes to Pending Developer Release, then you can release a version. For more information about app review, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/manage-submissions-to-app-review/submit-for-review]. For more information about manually releasing versions, see [https://devcms.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/manage-your-apps-availability/select-a-version-release-option]. For more information about app status, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/reference/app-and-submission-statuses].
title: Manually Release an App Store Approved Version of Your App
